txt.en: 'You have been a great help, in the wake of Lachír's folly. You have helped lead us to conquer what resistance and pitfalls we have encountered here in Mordor.\n\n'Some of our company has pressed through, past the gates of Carach Angren, and into Dor Amarth. When you have accomplished all that you wish to do here with us in Udûn, those in Dor Amarth could use your aid.'
Travel to the Ruins of Díngarth in Dor Amarth
Gimli and Ingold can be found at the Ruins of Díngarth in Dor Amarth.\n\nWhen you have completed all you wish to do in Udûn you should speak to Gimli and Ingold.
When you have completed all you wish to do in Udûn you should speak to Gimli and Ingold about Dor Amarth.
'We have managed to push through Udûn with only a small resistance. Now the task before us is to see what remains of Sauron's citadel, Barad-dûr. I am glad you are with us.'
Few have braved beyond the borders of Udûn

'It is good to be in the thick of things again, isn't it [placeholder]. It was odd to see dwarves in Udûn. I did not realize any lived in Mordor! Do you suppose there are more of my lost kin in these lands?'
It is good to be in the thick of things again, isn't it!
The Burning Plains of Dor Amarth
The Ruins of Díngarth is located near Udûn in Dor Amarth.\n\nYou should travel to the Ruins of Díngarth.
